Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 91st/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston and 91st: due to, street blockage near 91st/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston and 91st: due to, street blockage near 91st/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
